job_details.Functieomschrijving:
IT Security is very important to DeepL. To ensure that our data remains secure, you will join our Security team, working closely with our engineering teams to secure our applications, systems, devices, and environments. Depending on the need, you will introduce new components and develop the existing infrastructure, as part of our experienced, supportive, and collaborative IT Security team., Depending on your focus area, you will:
     * Have an open eye for security improvements
     * Perform security reviews and advise other teams with security-related questions
     * Recognize threats and triage upcoming vulnerabilities
     * Help building solutions to improve the security of our infrastructure, network, and services
     * Automate security processes in the development life-cycle
     * Create visibility by onboarding new events into our SIEM

   What we offer

     *
       Diverse and internationally distributed team: joining our team means becoming part of a large, global community with people of more than 90 nationalities. We're more than just colleagues; we're a group of professionals with a shared mission to connect diverse cultures. Our global presence is growing-we've doubled in size nearly every year, with our employees based in the UK, Germany, the Netherlands, Poland, the US, and Japan, and we continue to expand our network.

     * Open communication, regular feedback: as a language-focused company, we value the importance of clear, honest communication. We value smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.

     * Remote work, flexible hours: whether you're near or in our hubs in cities like Cologne, Berlin, Amsterdam, London, Austin, or Tokyo, or prefer the comfort of your own home, you decide where your office is. We offer remote opportunities, flexible working hours and trust in your productivity, all in sync with your team's general locations and time zones to foster effective and seamless collaboration. Our aim is to integrate your work with your lifestyle, ensuring a balance that respects both your needs and our operational requirements.

     * Regular in-person team events: we bond over vibrant events that are as unique as our team, from local team and business unit gatherings, to new-joiner onboardings, to company-wide events that bring us all together-literally.

     * Monthly full-day hacking sessions: every month, we have Hack Fridays, where you can spend your time diving into a project you're passionate about and get the opportunity to work with other teams-we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity.

     * Comprehensive health insurance: your health comes first. With our comprehensive insurance, we'll make sure you're covered from head to toe.

     * 30 days of annual leave: we value your peace of mind. With 30 days off (excluding public holidays) and access to mental health resources, we make sure you're as strong mentally as you are professionally.
     * Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development-pick a learning path which contributes to your career development and we'll back you up.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on IT Security and general security engineering tasks, not on AI/ML model development or deployment. While it mentions automation and infrastructure improvement, these are within a security context and do not align with the core responsibilities of an ML or GenAI Engineer.

phrases: IT Security is very important to DeepL
To ensure that our data remains secure
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of the business's need for security and its importance to the company's operations.

phrases: secure our applications, systems, devices, and environments
introduce new components and develop the existing infrastructure
Help building solutions to improve the security of our infrastructure, network, and services
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the development and improvement of systems and infrastructure, which falls under software development, albeit with a security focus.

phrases: Automate security processes in the development life-cycle
Create visibility by onboarding new events into our SIEM
job_tasks.justification: Automating processes within the development lifecycle and integrating with security information and event management (SIEM) systems are operational tasks related to managing and monitoring security infrastructure.

phrases: working closely with our engineering teams

Diverse and internationally distributed team
Open communication, regular feedback
smooth collaboration
foster effective and seamless collaboration
soft_skills.justification: The description emphasizes working with other teams, providing advice, and being part of a collaborative and communicative environment.

phrases: Annual learning budget
soft_skills.justification: The mention of an annual learning budget directly implies a focus on continuous learning and professional development.
